#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
//typedef long long lint;
#define mod 1000000007
#define lint long long
lint pwr(lint base,lint exponent)
{
    lint result = 1;
    while (exponent>0)
    {
        if (exponent & 1)
            result = (result * base) % mod;
        exponent = exponent >> 1;
        base = (base * base) % mod;
    }
    return result%mod;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    lint n,m,ans;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ans=0;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&n,&m);
        if(n==1) printf("%lld\n",m);
        else if(n==2) printf("%lld\n",((m*(m-1))%mod));
        else
        {
            ans=ans+(m*(m-1))%mod;
            //n=n-2;
            ans=(ans*pwr(m-2,n-2))%mod;
            printf("%lld\n",ans);
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
